title: U.S. Needs To Win Or Tie Germany To Advance In World Cup Play
teaser: The U.S. soccer team meets Germany in a must-win World Cup match Thursday. The Americans need a win or a tie to decide their own fate â€” a loss would mean they need help to advance to the round of 16.
